name: Peter Do
what_you_do: PETER DO is a fashion brand established in 2018 in New York City, dedicated to creating a new future in fashion through thoughtful design and a process of reduction that tests and refines every detail.
who_you_serve: The brand serves fashion-conscious consumers globally, particularly those interested in innovative and thoughtfully designed clothing.
bio: Peter Do was the recipient of the inaugural 2014 LVMH Graduate Prize and has worked in renowned fashion houses such as Céline and Derek Lam.
business_focus: PETER DO is a fashion brand established in 2018 in New York City, dedicated to creating a new future in fashion through thoughtful design and a process of reduction that tests and refines every detail. (fashion design)
